text: Meitei script () or Meetei script () is an abugida used for Meitei language (officially known as Manipuri language), the sole official language, the lingua franca and the predominantly spoken tongue of the Indian state of Manipur.https://www.researchgate.net/figure/Meitei-Mayek- Alphabets_fig1_328718529 ==Gallery== Meetei_Mayek.png Meitei-mayek-script.png Meetei_alphabet_origin.jpg Ancient_Meitei_Mayek_consonants.gif Ancient_Meitei_Mayek_diacritics.gif Ancient_Meitei_Mayek_vowels.gif ==Related pages== * Meitei numerals ==Sources== * https://scriptsource.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item_id=script_detail_sym&key;=Mtei ==References== Category:Alphabets Category:Brahmic scripts
title: Meitei script
